item.title: Dyneema’s New Fiber Composite Is Lighter, Stronger, and More Durable Than Ever
item.description: Hyperlite Mountain Gear and Dyneema collaborate on lighter, more durable hiking backpacks, which lets you put even more Dyneema on your Dyneema.
